Comments_List: I learned about a diversity of methods used to study human neuroscience and neuropsychiatry. I also learned about varying disorders.
By taking this course I learned a lot about applications of medical imaging in psychiatric disorders.
Learned a lot about imaging approaches. Very useful lectures.
Strengths: manageable workload, engaging readings, unique opportunity to hear PIs talk about their research, good platform for discussion
I like that the course was structured as more of a seminar-based class, with class lecturers presenting on their areas of expertise.
